title: MBMBaM 612: Love is a Competition
description:
We recorded this early, but we desperately need an answer to a mystery. It’s been haunting us since the letter came in. PLEASE release us from this torment.

Suggested talking points: You’re the Blood in My Bread, Gozer Beer, Work Glitter, The Tushless Town, Dark Green Iridescent Mystery

NARAL Pro-Choice America: https://www.prochoiceamerica.org/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
